item.title: Van is blocking drive, 2nd December
item.description:
Van has been blocking drive since 4pm ish Monday 1 December. I only managed to get my car of the drive when neighbour moved their car off their drive. At present this means my drive is not accessible. The van is not of interest to the police (ref: CAD1721/02DEC25). I've checked and it is taxed until 1 May 2026 but MOT expired 29 November 25 so any insurance will be invalid. Have reported to the council parking enforcement ref: 584209

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmcroft Road, Goddington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins storred incorrectly on land, 2nd December
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Filey Avenue, Hackney, London
